derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: alteration of earlier bridemaid

entry.def: A bridesmaid is a woman or a girl who helps and accompanies a bride on her wedding day.

means.word_mean: 1. an unmarried woman who attends the bride at a wedding
